alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:41PM EST until March 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LIGHT FREEZING RAIN SUNDAY... .Precipitation is expected to overspread the area Sunday morning and gradually increase in coverage and intensity through the day. Temperatures will stubbornly remain below freezing across the interior portions of western Maine and freezing rain is likely. While amounts will not be heavy, they may lead to icy road conditions during the first half of the day before temperatures climb above freezing. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 2 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Central Somerset, Northern Franklin and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 2 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to light freezing rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
